pr_title: Jenkins: adjust test excludes for cmake builds

timeline.bodyText: Pls keep these (and special.system) excluded for Java 8 until such time as we're ready to switch this version. We only have so many machines, and want to get through the nightly testing.
timeline.author: pshipton

timeline.message:
Jenkins: adjust test excludes for cmake builds

- Remove test excludes on the "cmake" build spec. Exculdes can be added
on a per-spec basis
- Remove test expludes on xlinux cmake build

Signed-off-by: Devin Nakamura <devinn@ca.ibm.com>
